content.p: Associate Professor, Faculty of Social Sciences Okafor Luke Emeka is an Associate Professor at the University of Nottingham, Malaysia Campus (UNMC). He received his Ph.D. in Economics from Monash University, Australia in 2015. Prior to joining UNMC, he has worked at Monash University, Australia, State Street Bank, Poland, Institute of Ecumenical Education, Nigeria and African Thinkers Community of Inquiry College of Education, Nigeria. Luke teaches Quantitative Economics I, Introduction to Macroeconomics, International Trade and Advanced International Trade Theory at UNMC.
